title: BitcoinTS.org
author: BitcoinTS.org
content: Here is the Bitcoin Token Standards list:https://docs.bitcoints.org/

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: To be clear none of these are "bitcoin" token standards since none of these protocols exist in the Bitcoin protocol, and they are not enforced by it. These are centralized virtual ideas that only exist in centralized platforms that can change just as easily.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Can these discussions be classified as belonging to the Bitcoin protocol discussions, given that all these tokens are Bitcoin Taproot inscriptions it's not even in the protocol but just a JSON tokenization, it's not even a smart contract..I didn't expect it to see more than brc-20 but brc-721/brc-777/brc-1155, are people serious  ?
